Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
nbwrpg group:

In council discussions, we thought that 
we might have a period of a week or two 
when we would discuss only about the 
rpg and where we want the action to go. 
There would be no in game posts for 
that period.
PLEASE VOTE ONLY ONCE FOR EACH QUESTION
Question 1: Do you approve for a 
discussion period?
Question 2: How long should that 
question be?
Question 3: When would that be? 

  o Yes, I approve the discussion 
  o No, I do not approve 
  o ***** 
  o 1 week 
  o 2 weeks 
  o less than a week 
  o more than 2 weeks 
  o ***** 
  o During the Holidays (starting December 26) 
  o After the holidays (January 2) 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/surveys?id=1164433  

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
